scenario_text.value: I am ready for the report.

Well, you see...
Garurumon captured her once.

And then he met fierce resistance.
The maiden...

The enemy revolted against my plan!
It’s all because Garurumon let her go!

Your plan was flawed.
That’s all that needs to be said.

So the one who screwed the strategy up wants
to make it MY fault?!

I had pacified the children. They were
easier to hunt! You wasted all that!

Collecting sacrifices is indeed our duty,
and it is clear that these children are difficult.
However, do not lose sight of our priorities.
Our master seeks the priestess maiden.

I care not how it is done.
Bring the maiden to me, here.

I shall not tolerate another failure.
Do you understand me?

Yes, my liege! Absolutely!
The maiden shall be brought here!
